title: my lock hotkey doesnt 'lock'
body: When I click my 'Lock' hotkey, it doesn't exactly lock, it moves around with my mouse like a normal screen as if I didn't press the button. I can't find an option to change it. When I change the settings back to default it does nothing for it. please help.

replies.body:
Hey GPuL Megg,

Can you try repairing your client and see if that resolves your issue?
http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article
One of my mates figured it out man, but thanks anyway.
Oh, out of curiosity, what was the solution?
